result.ponchtml: Ní hé an t-aṫaontú údar gaċ oilcThe re-unification is not the root of all evil.

result.eng: Their mouth started watering with all that hunger.
result.ga: Tháinig uisce lena bhfiacla ar mhéad is a bhí d'ocras orthu
result.orig: Tháinig uisce lena bhfiacla ar mhéad is a bhí d'ocras orthu
result.html: Tháinig uisce lena bhfiacla ar mhéad is a bhí d'ocras orthuTheir mouth started watering with all that hunger.
result.ponchtml: Ṫáinig uisce lena ḃfiacla ar ṁéad is a ḃí d'ocras orṫuTheir mouth started watering with all that hunger.

result.eng: I don't remember all the details of the story but I do remember that he told it beautifully.
result.ga: Ní cuimhin liom gach pioc den scéal ach is cuimhin liom gur inis sé go hálainn é
result.orig: Ní cuimhin liom gach pioc den scéal ach is cuimhin liom gur inis sé go hálainn é
result.html: Ní cuimhin liom gach pioc den scéal ach is cuimhin liom gur inis sé go hálainn éI don't remember all the details of the story but I do remember that he told it beautifully.
result.ponchtml: Ní cuiṁin liom gaċ pioc den scéal aċ is cuiṁin liom gur inis sé go hálainn éI don't remember all the details of the story but I do remember that he told it beautifully.

result.eng: I looked closely to see if anything was moving, anything at all. Am I the only living creature here?
result.ga: D'fhéach mé go grinn ag iarraidh cor a fheiceáil cor beag ar bith An mise an t-aon neach beo anseo
result.orig: D'fhéach mé go grinn ag iarraidh cor a fheiceáil cor beag ar bith An mise an t-aon neach beo anseo
result.html: D'fhéach mé go grinn ag iarraidh cor a fheiceáil cor beag ar bith An mise an t-aon neach beo anseoI looked closely to see if anything was moving, anything at all. Am I the only living creature here?
result.ponchtml: D'ḟéaċ mé go grinn ag iarraiḋ cor a ḟeiceáil cor beag ar biṫ An mise an t-aon neaċ beo anseoI looked closely to see if anything was moving, anything at all. Am I the only living creature here?

result.eng: He had dogs with him. All I remember is their teeth snarling at us.
result.ga: Bhí madraí leis Ní cuimhin liom ach a gcuid fiacla ag drannadh orainn
result.orig: Bhí madraí leis Ní cuimhin liom ach a gcuid fiacla ag drannadh orainn
result.html: Bhí madraí leis Ní cuimhin liom ach a gcuid fiacla ag drannadh orainnHe had dogs with him. All I remember is their teeth snarling at us.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí madraí leis Ní cuiṁin liom aċ a gcuid fiacla ag drannaḋ orainnHe had dogs with him. All I remember is their teeth snarling at us.

result.eng: 'They're coming to get us!' yelled one of the young men and we all rejoiced.
result.ga: Tá siad ag teacht faoinár ndéin liúigh duine de na fir óga agus bhí gliondar croí orainn go léir
result.orig: Tá siad ag teacht faoinár ndéin liúigh duine de na fir óga agus bhí gliondar croí orainn go léir
result.html: Tá siad ag teacht faoinár ndéin liúigh duine de na fir óga agus bhí gliondar croí orainn go léir'They're coming to get us!' yelled one of the young men and we all rejoiced.
result.ponchtml: Tá siad ag teaċt faoinár ndéin liúiġ duine de na fir óga agus ḃí gliondar croí orainn go léir'They're coming to get us!' yelled one of the young men and we all rejoiced.

result.eng: She back out of the cave on all fours.
result.ga: Chúlaigh sí amach as an bpluais ar na ceithre boinn
result.orig: Chúlaigh sí amach as an bpluais ar na ceithre boinn
result.html: Chúlaigh sí amach as an bpluais ar na ceithre boinnShe back out of the cave on all fours.
result.ponchtml: Ċúlaiġ sí amaċ as an bpluais ar na ceiṫre boinnShe back out of the cave on all fours.

result.eng: No imagination at all is needed to understand this.
result.ga: Níl samhlaíocht ar bith ag teastáil chun é seo a thuiscint
result.orig: Níl samhlaíocht ar bith ag teastáil chun é seo a thuiscint
result.html: Níl samhlaíocht ar bith ag teastáil chun é seo a thuiscintNo imagination at all is needed to understand this.
result.ponchtml: Níl saṁlaíoċt ar biṫ ag teastáil ċun é seo a ṫuiscintNo imagination at all is needed to understand this.

result.eng: It was no surprise at all for me that she was a spy.
result.ga: Níorbh iontas ar bith dom gur spiaire í
result.orig: Níorbh iontas ar bith dom gur spiaire í
result.html: Níorbh iontas ar bith dom gur spiaire íIt was no surprise at all for me that she was a spy.
result.ponchtml: Níorḃ iontas ar biṫ dom gur spiaire íIt was no surprise at all for me that she was a spy.

result.eng: According to the professor, it is not at all clear why it happened.
result.ga: Dar leis an ollamh níl sé soiléir in aon chor cén fáth ar tharla sé
result.orig: Dar leis an ollamh níl sé soiléir in aon chor cén fáth ar tharla sé
result.html: Dar leis an ollamh níl sé soiléir in aon chor cén fáth ar tharla séAccording to the professor, it is not at all clear why it happened.
result.ponchtml: Dar leis an ollaṁ níl sé soiléir in aon ċor cén fáṫ ar ṫarla séAccording to the professor, it is not at all clear why it happened.

result.eng: All you could see on the building was a big hole in its side.
result.ga: Ní raibh le feiceáil ar an túr ach poll mór ina thaobh
result.orig: Ní raibh le feiceáil ar an túr ach poll mór ina thaobh
result.html: Ní raibh le feiceáil ar an túr ach poll mór ina thaobhAll you could see on the building was a big hole in its side.
result.ponchtml: Ní raiḃ le feiceáil ar an túr aċ poll mór ina ṫaoḃAll you could see on the building was a big hole in its side.

result.eng: One [TV] presenter thought there was no airplane involved at all, and that it was a bomb.
result.ga: Shíl láithreoir amháin nach raibh eitleán ar bith i gceist agus go mba bhuama é
result.orig: Shíl láithreoir amháin nach raibh eitleán ar bith i gceist agus go mba bhuama é
result.html: Shíl láithreoir amháin nach raibh eitleán ar bith i gceist agus go mba bhuama éOne [TV] presenter thought there was no airplane involved at all, and that it was a bomb.
result.ponchtml: Ṡíl láiṫreoir aṁáin naċ raiḃ eitleán ar biṫ i gceist agus go mba ḃuama éOne [TV] presenter thought there was no airplane involved at all, and that it was a bomb.

result.eng: An airplane couldn't go all the way through the building, could it?
result.ga: Ní fhéadfadh eitleán dul an bealach ar fad tríd an bhfoirgneamh an bhféadfadh
result.orig: Ní fhéadfadh eitleán dul an bealach ar fad tríd an bhfoirgneamh an bhféadfadh
result.html: Ní fhéadfadh eitleán dul an bealach ar fad tríd an bhfoirgneamh an bhféadfadhAn airplane couldn't go all the way through the building, could it?
result.ponchtml: Ní ḟéadfaḋ eitleán dul an bealaċ ar fad tríd an ḃfoirgneaṁ an ḃféadfaḋAn airplane couldn't go all the way through the building, could it?

result.eng: And in addition to that, if it was a bomb, why didn't all sides explode, instead of just the two sides?
result.ga: Agus le cois sin dá mba bhuama é cén fáth nár pléascadh gach taobh seachas an dá thaobh amháin
result.orig: Agus le cois sin dá mba bhuama é cén fáth nár pléascadh gach taobh seachas an dá thaobh amháin
result.html: Agus le cois sin dá mba bhuama é cén fáth nár pléascadh gach taobh seachas an dá thaobh amháinAnd in addition to that, if it was a bomb, why didn't all sides explode, instead of just the two sides?
result.ponchtml: Agus le cois sin dá mba ḃuama é cén fáṫ nár pléascaḋ gaċ taoḃ seaċas an dá ṫaoḃ aṁáinAnd in addition to that, if it was a bomb, why didn't all sides explode, instead of just the two sides?

result.eng: All airports in the country were closed.
result.ga: Dúnadh aerfoirt uilig na tíre
result.orig: Dúnadh aerfoirt uilig na tíre
result.html: Dúnadh aerfoirt uilig na tíreAll airports in the country were closed.
result.ponchtml: Dúnaḋ aerfoirt uilig na tíreAll airports in the country were closed.

result.eng: All you could hear the bloggers about... was deadly silence.
result.ga: Ciúnas na reilige a bhí le cluinstean ó na blagadóirí faoi
result.orig: Ciúnas na reilige a bhí le cluinstean ó na blagadóirí faoi
result.html: Ciúnas na reilige a bhí le cluinstean ó na blagadóirí faoiAll you could hear the bloggers about... was deadly silence.
result.ponchtml: Ciúnas na reilige a ḃí le cluinstean ó na blagadóirí faoiAll you could hear the bloggers about... was deadly silence.

result.eng: All the children started laughing and couldn't stop.
result.ga: Fágadh iomlán na bpáistí sioctha leis na gáirí
result.orig: Fágadh iomlán na bpáistí sioctha leis na gáirí
result.html: Fágadh iomlán na bpáistí sioctha leis na gáiríAll the children started laughing and couldn't stop.
result.ponchtml: Fágaḋ iomlán na bpáistí siocṫa leis na gáiríAll the children started laughing and couldn't stop.

result.eng: You have the children all confused, if I must say so.
result.ga: Tá na páistí amú agat ó chaithfidh mé a rá leat
result.orig: Tá na páistí amú agat ó chaithfidh mé a rá leat
result.html: Tá na páistí amú agat ó chaithfidh mé a rá leatYou have the children all confused, if I must say so.
result.ponchtml: Tá na páistí amú agat ó ċaiṫfiḋ mé a rá leatYou have the children all confused, if I must say so.

result.eng: They are all among the dead.
result.ga: Tá siad uilig ar shlua na marbh
result.orig: Tá siad uilig ar shlua na marbh
result.html: Tá siad uilig ar shlua na marbhThey are all among the dead.
result.ponchtml: Tá siad uilig ar ẛlua na marḃThey are all among the dead.

result.eng: Who did you pray for? Who are all the people you prayed for?
result.ga: Cé leis uilig ar chuir tú paidir
result.orig: Cé leis uilig ar chuir tú paidir
result.html: Cé leis uilig ar chuir tú paidirWho did you pray for? Who are all the people you prayed for?
result.ponchtml: Cé leis uilig ar ċuir tú paidirWho did you pray for? Who are all the people you prayed for?

result.eng: We depend on him for food all year round.
result.ga: Tá muid ina mhuinín fá choinne bia bliana
result.orig: Tá muid ina mhuinín fá choinne bia bliana
result.html: Tá muid ina mhuinín fá choinne bia blianaWe depend on him for food all year round.
result.ponchtml: Tá muid ina ṁuinín fá ċoinne bia blianaWe depend on him for food all year round.

result.eng: All you need to care about is that the old folks are happy.
result.ga: Is cuma duitse ach an tseanlánúin a bheith sásta
result.orig: Is cuma duitse ach an tseanlánúin a bheith sásta
result.html: Is cuma duitse ach an tseanlánúin a bheith sástaAll you need to care about is that the old folks are happy.
result.ponchtml: Is cuma duitse aċ an tseanlánúin a ḃeiṫ sástaAll you need to care about is that the old folks are happy.

result.eng: It's all over for you.
result.ga: Tá sé uilig thart agatsa
result.orig: Tá sé uilig thart agatsa
result.html: Tá sé uilig thart agatsaIt's all over for you.
result.ponchtml: Tá sé uilig ṫart agatsaIt's all over for you.

result.eng: He fell on all fours.
result.ga: Thit sé ar a cheithre boinn
result.orig: Thit sé ar a cheithre boinn
result.html: Thit sé ar a cheithre boinnHe fell on all fours.
result.ponchtml: Ṫit sé ar a ċeiṫre boinnHe fell on all fours.

result.eng: He went on all fours.
result.ga: Chuaigh sé ar a cheithre boinn
result.orig: Chuaigh sé ar a cheithre boinn
result.html: Chuaigh sé ar a cheithre boinnHe went on all fours.
result.ponchtml: Ċuaiġ sé ar a ċeiṫre boinnHe went on all fours.

result.eng: All you need to care aboit in this world is to steal in a way the law allows.
result.ga: Is cuma duit ar an tsaol seo ach goid de réir dlí
result.orig: Is cuma duit ar an tsaol seo ach goid de réir dlí
result.html: Is cuma duit ar an tsaol seo ach goid de réir dlíAll you need to care aboit in this world is to steal in a way the law allows.
result.ponchtml: Is cuma duit ar an tsaol seo aċ goid de réir dlíAll you need to care aboit in this world is to steal in a way the law allows.

result.eng: I hated him passionately with all my heart.
result.ga: Bhí fuath na námhad agam air i mo chroí
result.orig: Bhí fuath na námhad agam air i mo chroí
result.html: Bhí fuath na námhad agam air i mo chroíI hated him passionately with all my heart.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí fuaṫ na náṁad agam air i mo ċroíI hated him passionately with all my heart.

result.eng: They all made a promise to one another.
result.ga: Thug 'ach aon duine acu lámh is focal don duine eile
result.orig: Thug 'ach aon duine acu lámh is focal don duine eile
result.html: Thug 'ach aon duine acu lámh is focal don duine eileThey all made a promise to one another.
result.ponchtml: Ṫug 'aċ aon duine acu láṁ is focal don duine eileThey all made a promise to one another.

result.eng: It would all be over now and my troubles would be no more.
result.ga: Bheadh sé uilig thart anois agus bheinn as buaireamh
result.orig: Bheadh sé uilig thart anois agus bheinn as buaireamh
result.html: Bheadh sé uilig thart anois agus bheinn as buaireamhIt would all be over now and my troubles would be no more.
result.ponchtml: Ḃeaḋ sé uilig ṫart anois agus ḃeinn as buaireaṁIt would all be over now and my troubles would be no more.

result.eng: Where was he all that time?
result.ga: Cá raibh sé le fada riamh
result.orig: Cá raibh sé le fada riamh
result.html: Cá raibh sé le fada riamhWhere was he all that time?
result.ponchtml: Cá raiḃ sé le fada riaṁWhere was he all that time?

result.eng: All they talked about was the war.
result.ga: Ní raibh as a mbéal ach an cogadh
result.orig: Ní raibh as a mbéal ach an cogadh
result.html: Ní raibh as a mbéal ach an cogadhAll they talked about was the war.
result.ponchtml: Ní raiḃ as a mbéal aċ an cogaḋAll they talked about was the war.
